sentences.en: Dinosaurs have been extinct for millions of years.
sentences.cn: 恐龙绝种已有几百万年了.
法西斯主义在意大利消灭了.

sentences.en: He was one of a class rapidly becoming extinct in Wessex.
sentences.cn: 在维塞可斯那块地方上,他是属于眼看就要完全绝迹了那种行业中的一员.

sentences.en: Is there anything could rekindle his extinct passion?
sentences.cn: 有什么事情可重燃他逝去的热情 呢 ?

sentences.en: It is 250 years since the wolf became extinct in Britain.
sentences.cn: 狼在英国已经灭绝250年了。

sentences.en: Its tallest volcano, long extinct, is Olympus Mons.
sentences.cn: 它最高的火山是早已熄灭的奥林波斯山。

sentences.en: Many animals and birds are now extinct.
Mr Charrington, thought Winston, was another extinct animal.
sentences.cn: 温斯顿觉得, 查林顿先生也算个绝种的动物呢.

sentences.en: Pandas could become extinct in the wild.
sentences.cn: 熊猫在野生环境中可能会绝种。

sentences.en: Small wonder that Greek mythology is extinct.
sentences.cn: 希腊神话现在给人淡忘了,这并不足为奇.

sentences.en: The extinct exotic bird's feather contains zinc.
sentences.cn: 那种已绝迹的珍奇的鸟的羽毛中含锌。

sentences.en: The extinct volcano's eruption would mean a cataclysm for the city.
sentences.cn: 死火山又重新喷发,对这座城市来说意味着大难临头.

sentences.en: The idea of cloning extinct life forms still belongs to science fiction.
sentences.cn: 克隆已经灭绝的生物的想法仍旧只限于科幻小说中。

sentences.en: This report is from David Cook of our Science Unit: "Why did the dinosaurs become extinct?"
sentences.cn: 以下是来自我们科学部的戴维·库克的报道:“为什么恐龙灭绝了?”

sentences.en: This view is nearly extinct in the treatment of children.
sentences.cn: 这种想法在对待儿童方面已差不多消除了.

trans.tran_cn: 灭绝的，废除了的，（火山）死的
trans.tran_en: an extinct type of animal or plant does not exist any more
